01. GROUP BY

TheÂ GROUP BYÂ statement groups rows that have the same values into summary rows, like â€œfind the number of customers in each countryâ€.Â 
TheÂ GROUP BYÂ statement is often used with aggregate functions (COUNT(),Â MAX(),Â MIN(),Â SUM(),Â AVG()) to group the result-set by one or more columns.
